oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Allen-White School: correspondence regarding historic registers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Harper, Herbert L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 100 Allen Extension Road, Whiteville, Hardeman Co., TN

Correspondence from Herbert L. Harper, Deputy State Historic Preservation Officer to Reverend Guy Hendree informing him of Allen-White School's placement in the National and Tennessee Registers of Historic Places

The Allen-White School was built 1918-1920 with support of the Julius Rosenwald Fund. When the school closed, the building was acquired by a non-profit organization associated with ElCanaan Missionary Baptist Church. The building was destroyed by arson in May of 2012
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Julius Rosenwald Fund -- Buildings; School buildings -- Tennessee
